pageProps.title: Multiplayer Networking with Godot: A Practical Guide
pageProps.metaDesc: Godot is a popular open-source game engine that allows game developers to create 2D and 3D games for multiple platforms. Godot has a built-in networking system that enables developers to create multiplayer games that can be played online or on a local network. In this article, we will cover the basics of multiplayer networking with Godot and provide practical examples to help you get started.
